```{r}

library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
data <- 
read_delim("rapport_fabrice.csv", delim = ";")

```

```{r}

unique(data$rq) %>% view()

```

```{r}

filter_data_1 <- 
data %>% 
  filter(!str_detect(rq, "lombaire|preview|Rapport|RACHIS|Rachis|rachis|Reconstruction|resume|Screen|Smart|SUREST| os|AFFICHER|Dose|reform|LOMB|Protocol|Process|Reformat|recon|Recon|State")
  ) %>%
  select(type_examen, localisation, rq)

```


```{r}

write_delim(filter_data_1, "20260217_export_dicom_filtre_avec_poumon.csv", delim = ";")

```

```{r}

filter_data_2 <- 
filter_data_1 %>% 
  filter(!str_detect(rq, "LUNG|Mediastin|Parenchyme|PARENCHY|HYBRI|LOCA|POUMON|Poumon|poumon"))


```


```{r}
write_delim(filter_data_2, "20260217_export_dicom_filtre_sans_poumon.csv", delim = ";")

```
